/*
	NPC: ID:
	NX Item Gachapon Ticket Id: 4031785
*/
randnx = Math.floor(Math.random() * 30000);
nxitems = [1702118, 1702119, 1702120, 1702136, 1702203, 1702071, 1702075, 1702069, 1702067, 1702077, 1702076, 1702068, 1702149, 1702150, 1702235, 1702008, 1702211, 1702044, 1702043, 1702190, 1702100, 1050128, 1050145, 1051113, 1052017, 1052018, 1052019, 1052044, 1052057, 1052058, 1052059, 1052060, 1052061, 1052052, 1052063, 1052064, 1052065, 1052066, 1052067, 1052068, 1052170, 1052083, 1052147, 1052172, 1052151, 1052152, 1052055, 1050115, 1050112, 1082224, 1082225, 1082155, 1082124, 1082057, 1082058, 1082101, 1072282, 1072283, 1072281, 1072407, 1072406, 1072404, 1072175, 1072253, 1071010, 1072277, 1072278, 1070001, 1071003, 1071016, 1070005, 1072328, 1072327, 1072349, 1072333, 1072341, 1072330, 1102097, 1102095, 102096, 1102148, 1102149, 1102184, 1102152, 1102019, 1102036, 1102037, 1102038, 1102212, 1102229, 1032038, 1032034, 1012007, 1010006, 1012044, 1012081, 1022017, 1022021, 1022051, 1022079, 1012004, 1022009, 1010004, 1010005, 5010005, 5010008, 5010009, 5010010, 5010011, 5010012, 5010013, 5010014, 5010020, 5010022, 5010023, 5010028, 5010029, 5010030, 5010031, 5010032, 5010046, 5010048, 5010049, 5010069];

function start() {
	cm.sendSimple(" Hello there and Welcome to the NX Item Gachapon! What would you like to do with your #v4031785#? \r\n #L0# Trade for a random Rare NX Item #l\r\n #L1# Trade For a Random Amount of NX ( 1 - 30k ) "); 
}

function action(m,t,s) {
	if (m != 0) {
		if (cm.haveItem(4031785, 1)) {
			if (s == 0) {
				randitem = Math.floor(Math.random() * nxitems.length);
				cm.sendOk(" You have gained a #t"+nxitems[randitem]+"# #v"+nxitems[randitem]+"# ! Come back with another Ticket to play again! ");
				cm.gainItem(nxitems[randitem], 1);
			} else if (s == 1) {
				cm.sendOk(" You have gained " + randnx + " Nexon Points! Come back with another Ticket to play again! "); 
				cm.getPlayer().getCashShop().gainCash(1, randnx);
			}
			cm.gainItem(4031785, -1);
		} else
			cm.sendOk(" Sorry, you don't have 1 #t4031785# #v4031785#. ");
	}
	cm.dispose();
}
